Phones.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
Phones.subtitle: Flagship Camera Beast
Phones.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra boasts a powerful camera setup, a stunning 6.8-inch display, and top-tier performance. With its pro-grade camera system and high-end specs, it's designed for photography enthusiasts and power users.

Phones.name: iPhone 13 Pro
Phones.subtitle: Apple's Pro Performance
Phones.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning ProMotion display, an improved camera system, and exceptional performance powered by Apple's latest chipset. It's a premium choice for Apple enthusiasts seeking top-notch performance and photography capabilities.

Phones.name: OnePlus 9 Pro
Phones.subtitle: Speed and Performance
Phones.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro delivers blazing-fast performance, a stunning display, and an impressive camera system co-engineered with Hasselblad. It's a flagship choice for users seeking exceptional speed and photography capabilities.

Phones.name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
Phones.subtitle: Ultimate Camera Setup
Phones.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra boasts an incredible camera setup, a high-refresh-rate display, and powerful performance. With its unique design and exceptional camera capabilities, it's a flagship offering for photography enthusiasts.

Phones.name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
Phones.subtitle: AI-Powered Photography
Phones.description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro features AI-powered photography, a high-quality display, and seamless integration with Google's ecosystem. Its emphasis on camera technology and software optimization makes it a standout choice for photo enthusiasts.

Phones.name: Realme GT
Phones.subtitle: Performance Powerhouse
Phones.description: The Realme GT offers top-tier performance, a high-refresh-rate display, and a sleek design. It's a value-packed choice for users seeking powerful performance without breaking the bank.

Phones.name: Vivo X60 Pro+
Phones.subtitle: Professional Photography
Phones.description: The Vivo X60 Pro+ emphasizes professional-grade photography, features a top-notch display, and offers smooth performance. It's an excellent choice for users seeking exceptional camera capabilities.

Phones.name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
Phones.subtitle: Innovative Design
Phones.description: The Oppo Find X3 Pro features an innovative design, a vibrant display with a high refresh rate, and a versatile camera system. Its unique design elements make it stand out among flagship smartphones.
